column1: I love this product! It exceeded my expectations and the build quality is top-notch.
Terrible service. The product arrived broken and the support was unhelpful.
Average experience — nothing special, but it does the job.
Absolutely fantastic! Will buy again and recommend to friends.
Not worth the money. Very disappointed with the performance.
The app is okay, some bugs but overall acceptable.
Amazing! Five stars — best purchase this year.
Horrible. Stopped working after a week.

Neutral comment: I used it once.
